name: cryptocipher
description: Simplified Node.js Encryption and Hashing Library. Security by design, enforcing strong standards and not allowing encryption to be easily broken. Allow your users and developers to focus on the application instead of how security will be handled.
author: Samuel Voeller <samuel.voeller@mxsrv.amethyst.live> (https://invite-to.amethyst.live)

scripts.upgrade: npx npm-check-updates -u --target latest --peer && wget https://www.toptal.com/developers/gitignore/api/node,yarn,webstorm+all,visualstudiocode,visualstudio -O ./origin.gitignore && echo '' > .gitignore && echo '# MANAGED FILE: PLEASE MAKE MODIFICATIONS TO ./user.gitignore' >> .gitignore && cat ./user.gitignore >> .gitignore && cat ./origin.gitignore >> .gitignore
